titles: The imposter dethron'd, or, The Quakers throne of truth detected to bee Satans seat of lyes by way of reply to a quaking and railing pamphlet written by Capt. Bishop entituled, The throne of truth exalted over the powers of darkness wherein is briefly hinted the rottenness of the Quakers conversion and perfection ... / by Ralph Farmer.
author: Farmer, Ralph.
publisher: Printed by R.I., for Edw. Thomas,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bristol Public Library.
keywords: Bishop, George, d. 1668. --  Throne of truth exalted.
